{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3617562,"name":"Rhett Adam","username":"rhettadam","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/rhettadam/{size}/270821_2.png","created_at":"2025-05-09T01:37:16.819Z","cooked":"

Peekorobo has come a long way lately — and this update brings some of the biggest changes yet. From interactive profiles to smarter ways to explore and compare teams, Peekorobo is now more connected, visual, and fun to use than ever.

User Profiles Are Here

  • Fully integrated PostgreSQL database for storing user data
  • Features:
    • View and visit other user profiles
    • Add friends (follow/unfollow system)
    • Favorite teams and events
    • Edit:
      • Avatar
      • Background color
      • Username
      • Bio
      • Affiliated team
      • User role

image1047×918 88.6 KB

Enhanced Search

  • Avatars added to team search bar results

  • Users are searchable now

  • Team Ranks now act as links, automatically applying country/state filters to the Teams page

image868×70 4.37 KB

image975×37 4.44 KB

Map Features

  • Improved Team Map:
    • Marker color reflects team ACE
    • Integrated search bar for locating specific teams

image1881×919 126 KB

Bubble Chart Tab (on Teams page)

  • Dynamic X/Y axis changes
  • Fully responsive to existing filters

image1266×675 130 KB

Avatars Tab (on Teams page)

  • Visual avatar grid for filtered teams
  • Fully responsive to existing filters

image1252×882 332 KB

Event Insights Tab (on Events page)

  • Event insights including Max ACE, Top 8 ACE, and Top 24 ACE
  • Fully responsive to existing filters

image1210×886 98.4 KB

New Tables (on Event and Teams pages)

  • More vibrant, informative tables showing Total, Auto, Teleop, Endgame ACE

image1231×828 102 KB
